trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Columbus
There were no other sightings in Columbus on or around July 10th 2006
Summary: Bright white lit solid looking object on a NW to SE trajectry
divs: Sighting DetailsI was going to bed and as I sat down on the bed I rolled to the other side near my alarm clock and glanced out the window. It was a clear night and I saw the above-described object travel from the right side of my window to the left. The tall tree in the yard is sparse and I could easily see it pass behind it in the sky. The shape was very unusually and unnerving. Very large, very bright shaped like an irregular tear drop with somewhat of an extention behind it. Very bizarre!
